name: [FGJ2020]從零號開始的異世界生活 No.0 - Starting Life in Another World
name_original: [FGJ2020]從零號開始的異世界生活 No.0 - Starting Life in Another World
description:
從零號開始的異世界生活

No.0 - Starting Life in Another World

你是一個母胎單身的25歲單身鋼鐵直男，某日出門你被貨車撞到，不小心穿越到另一個世界，那是一個只存在BL（Boy’s Love）和腐女的世界，來到這邊的男性都會在潛移默化的影響下，慢慢的被掰彎……

You are a staunchly straight, 25 year old kissless virgin who's never so much as held a girl's hand. One day you get hit by a car and are transported to another world with nothing but BL (boy's love) and fujoshi (rabid BL fangirls). Anyone unfortunate enough to end up here is slowly turned gay...
